message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $700,000 significantly undervalues the product.  To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $900,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850,000. Can you consider this price?
